name: Light Cycle
description:
The legend says that every 1000 years Susanoo wakes up to attack his sister Amaterasu due to an old dispute.
You represent a hero called by Amaterasu, with the mission to fight against the different yokais that Susano has sent to the world to plunge him into darkness.
As Amaterasu's envoy you will have the help of his powers to defeat them and save the world once more.
